descriptions:
["DescriptionThis home is located in a haven for greenery and wildlife whilst being right in the heart of the city.
A Mediterranean style property that is a Type A villa, this home is situated on a large plot in the heart of an exclusive neighborhood. It's a classic home, perfect for families with an active lifestyle and who love the outdoors.
There are 4 bedrooms in total with 3 upstairs, including the master bedroom, and 1 downstairs that is perfect for guests who are visiting. It can even be converted into a TV room or office if desired as well. All the bedrooms are spacious and come with walk-in closets and ensuite bathrooms. Of course, the master bedroom is the most impressive with views over the back garden and swimming pool area and with Jack and Jill sinks in the bathroom.
Otherwise, this villa is equipped with everything you might want for a perfect family lifestyle. From a family living room and study upstairs to a traditional majlis area at the front of the property for when guests are over to visit. The majlis even has its own terrace overlooking the front garden which can be opened up and is perfect for the cooler months of the year.
The living and dining space is designed for open plan living and the kitchen has been cleverly designed so that is can be opened up or closed off dependent on your wishes. The kitchen itself comes with built-in Miele appliances and is fully fitted with high-quality cabinetry.
Outside of the home, the community is safe and secure and perfect for families with pets. Greenery is all around you and residents have access to a private beach and can swim in a unique crystal lagoon whilst enjoying views over the Dubai skyline."]

descriptions: ['DescriptionThis stunning unit in Silverene Tower A offers the following features;  - Unfurnished - Tenanted until Jan 2020  - Marina View - Balcony going through to all bedrooms  - 1058 sqft Look down on a stunning and panoramic view of the Marina from two spectacular residential towers. descriptions:
['DescriptionThis fabulous 5-bed Sonoma villa, sitting on a plot of some 8,017 square feet, with golf and lake views is available to move into immediately.  
The ground floor accommodation comprises:
• Large Family Room
• Formal Living Room
• Dining Room
• Poggenpohl Kitchen with Miele appliances, and utility room
• Large basement TV room with Bang & Olufsen TV \ Audio player
• Guest bedroom with ensuite
• Externally access maid’s room
Upstairs there are 4 further bedrooms all with ensuite bathrooms and fitted wardrobes. The master bedroom occupies the width of the house and overlooks the swimming pool to the rear and central courtyard courtesy of a large terrace. One of the bedrooms also benefits from an additional study.
The gardens are mature and well maintained with the outside living comprising:
• Good sized garden with far-reaching golf and lake views
• Large swimming pool
• Courtyard central to the family, living and dining rooms
• Double garage and further parking for 2 cars
• Externally accessed plant room
• Buggy port
Sienna Lakes is popular with investors and families alike due to the quality finishing, high-end fittings from Grohe, and Villeroy & Boch, and the likeminded discerning families.']

descriptions: ["DescriptionPainstakingly built to world class, turn-key standards and situated high along the unique J frond, this flawless home was designed by internationally renowned French architect Thierry Moralli and built by one of Dubai\x92s leading construction firms, Horizon Contracting.G+2 \x96 15,600 sq. ft. BUA \x96 15,035 sq. ft. Plot6 en-suite bedrooms with sea facing balconiesGrade 1 white marble flooring throughoutSchuco doors and windowsSnaidero show kitchen (Pininfarina design) with Miele appliancesDornbracht and Bagno bathroom fixturesKNX home automation with Nest thermostatsThe sophisticated yet relaxed floor plan provides a unique ambiance offering cutting edge technology and a 'no expense spared' approach to luxury and personal comfort. The entire villa contains state-of-the-art, floor to ceiling Schuco doors and windows that provide seamless indoor/outdoor living allowing every room a point blank ocean panorama, with the iconic Dubai Marina skyline taking center stage. The formal lounge and dining room adjoin the fabulous pool and terraces from one side, with a more casual family living/dining area and impressive show kitchen connecting to the pool, cabana, BBQ and bar on the other. A separate production kitchen, guest bedroom, 3 self-contained staff rooms and 3 car garage complete the lower level.The two upper floors consist of 4 spacious en-suite bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, 2 family living areas with individual pantry\x92s and a superb master bedroom which comes with a large walk-in wardrobe, en-suite bathroom with Jacuzzi and a private terrace with awe inspiring views of the skyline of Dubai.This prized beachfront home has been expertly designed for lavish entertaining and flexible modern family living."]

descriptions:
["DescriptionAchiever Properties is proud to offer this gorgeous 5 bedrooms Independent Villa located in an exclusive premium community, in the Dubai Hills Estate. 
Single row
Corner villa
B.U.A: 4,283 sq.ft
Type E5: 5 Bedroom villa
4 Bathrooms
Independent Villa
The Villa is Fully Paid
Close proximity to a luscious park and a pool for recreational activities.
Exquisite design and modern luxury are uniquely embedded in the villa, which extensively spreads on a built up area of 4,283 Sq.ft, covering a humongous land area of 6,312.7 sq.ft approximately. 
Its a steal deal for anyone looking for the assurance that comes with an already handed over villa (as its in phase 1) with the convenience of using any means of financial aid as the title deed is readily available. 
Every detail has been carefully selected and crafted with quality, where the guest bedroom is located on the ground floor, while the grand style living room where gatherings can be entertained along with other beautiful and spacious 4 bedrooms are situated on the first floor. 
The top of the line chef's kitchen comes clad with fixtures along with a refrigerator. 
Sliding floor to ceiling windows of the balcony showcase views while opening up the home to bright light and fresh air. 
Viewing available at any time your convenience."]
